org.mdconverter.api.consolewriter

Interface ConsoleWriter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsoleWriterImpl

    public interface ConsoleWriter
    This interface defines the in- and output controls from and to the console to interact with the user Created by miso on 28.10.2015.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ConsoleWriter.LinePrefix
      This enum defines the output stream to be used and the Prefix for each line.

      • println

        Method to print multiple lines to console at once

        lines - Array to print out multiple lines at once
